item.title: Archimedean Spiral
Simple 2D Terrain Generation Using Perlin Noise
item.description: click mouse in iframe to generate a new map This sketch maps perlin noise between a value of 0 and 255 across a grid. Values greater than or equal to 100 are "grass", values between 75 and 100 are "sand", and values less than or equal to 75 are "water". Click here to render a fullscreen map Launch the p5.js editor
